author: Anonymous Gear
title: running local programs issues
question:
When I try to run racket files in intermediate student, my program will just run continuously without telling me if my function has errors or if it successfully ran. 
As I'm writing this my current program has been attempting to run for several minutes. My laptop is quite new, so I'm unsure of why this happening. 
Any advice on what I should do would be appreciated!
instructor_answer: Check the trampoline - are you making a call to one of the locally encapsulated functions or a call that results in infinite recursion?
